replies.body: Fire skins for champions with lots of embers would be amazing.

Hi lansing, thanks. This has been fixed!
Riot Please Perma Ban this person for posting this.

This skin is good but more particles would be better
Also, I was gifted a summoner icon from riot but I didnt actually get it.. RITO PLZ, are you trolling me
Rly? Diana is a moon champion meaning darkness, fire is closer to the sun so you have completely contradicted her loyalty
What if it represents her personality instead as a vengeful moon?
nope still doesn't matter, a moon champion cannot associate with fire/sun

But her hate for the Sun _**burns**_ within her (in the old Diana lore at least).

I ship it. Deona. Liana?

I miss the sale when a skin comes out, having to wait for months for the first sale is annoying, especially when you're only 200RP short
